Good Comments: The best choice for the series - good font, no errors in translations and good subbing overall, and must important - readable.
Well, I have a few of their subs and so far, I like them. :)
It was subbed good, translated well, and I'm happy that I watched it.
One of the best subs I have ever seen, good job.
They do a nice job, but do misspell some things. They also call Kallen, Karen. Nonetheless, they do a very nice job.
Their Subs are great that's is all :) .
Bad Comments: Good translating and timing.A job well done
Good translation and timing. They do misspell some things, but they are still understandable. Great job.
very nice font and size.  timing is great, as well.
A few mispellings but it's all good.

Good Comments: Few minor mistakes, but awesome translations and good grammar.
Great translation and grammar. Couldn't find any errors so far. They also keep the japanese names of the spirits, rituals, etc.
